HomePager.homePagerSubtitle1: Manage your security register using all the power of blockchain.
HomePager.homePagerSubtitle3: , digitize and secure your documents with ease.
HomePager.descTitle: In concrete terms, how does that work?
HomePager.descSubTitle: An NFT to seal them all!
HomePager.descText1: During a security check by an expert and after validation on your part, a digital document is generated.
HomePager.descText2: This document containing metadata will be saved on a decentralized storage space also called
HomePager.descText3: Another document will certify the verification and register it definitively in the blockchain. This document is called
HomePager.descText4: The NFT registered in the blockchain contains the following information
HomePager.descText6: The address or public key of the verifier
HomePager.cpyEnum3: Digital registers, no more paper registers
